content: here s a super cheery baby duck amigurumi to crochet its features include a rotund body a bill and stubby little wings included is also an egg shell which can house the baby duck this is the fairest duck of them all and i m reminded of that macbeth quote fair is fowl and fowl is fair wait was that how it goes p at any rate this wee duck is sure to imprint itself onto your heart it s a fun and quick project that lends itself great to occasions such as spring easter or baby showers it s sure to beguile any duck lover happy crocheting and please be sure to tag me with your projects on my instagram 1 or facebook 2 i d love to see i ve also created a video if you re a visual learner you can crochet along with me in this easy to follow youtube tutorial 3 **level ** easy great project for a beginner **finished size ** approximately 3 5in/9cm tall **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet half_double_crochet chain stitch increase and decrease 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan 3 https //youtu be/3-mbj-8_lf4
